Our
Mission

Our mission at Trudova is to make identifying, understanding, and purchasing an insurance product as simple, efficient, and streamlined as possible for the consumer. We are completely committed to the buying process and the consumers overall experience in it. Along w/ this commitment to the consumer experience, we are focused on delivering our insurance partners' best customers at scale.

Our
Founder

Brian Fife, the President and Founder of Trudova is a seasoned insurance veteran with over 34 years of experience in the insurance industry building sales organizations, and managing call center operations within some of the leading insurance companies in the world, most recently as the President of eFinancial prior to being acquired by Fidelity Life. Brian understands the insurance customer acquisition business from many angles, including what it takes to be your next great source of real-time leads and/or warm call transfers.

Are you a publisher
with solid traffic?

One of the primary ways Trudova generates massive quantities of high intent real-time leads and calls for our clients is through our strong working relationships with our affiliate network. We have a host of highly converting lead funnels in multiple insurance verticals (Life, Health, & Medicare Supplement Insurance) our publishers can choose from as well as highly competitive payouts. White label options are also available on a case by case basis - talk to your affiliate manager to setup.
